name: LPLinkMetadata
desc: An object that contains metadata about a URL.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL that returns the metadata, taking server-side redirects into account.

items.name: var originalURL: URL?
items.desc: The original URL of the metadata request.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: A representative title for the URL.

items.name: var iconProvider: NSItemProvider?
items.desc: An object that retrieves data corresponding to a representative icon for the URL.

items.name: var imageProvider: NSItemProvider?
items.desc: An object that retrieves data corresponding to a representative image for the URL.

items.name: var remoteVideoURL: URL?
items.desc: A remote URL corresponding to a representative video for the URL.

items.name: var videoProvider: NSItemProvider?
items.desc: An object that retrieves data corresponding to a representative video for the URL.
